casebody.data:
ASHMAN v. COMMERCIAL INSURANCE COMPANY [No. 256,

September Term, 1963.]

Decided March 31, 1964.

The cause was submitted to Henderson, Hammond, Prescott, HornEy and Sybert, JJ.

Submitted on brief by Louis S. Ashman, for the appellant. Submitted on brief by Herbert L. Grymes, for the appellee. Per Curiam.

The judgment appealed from in this case is affirmed for the reasons set out in the opinion of Chief Judge Manley in the court below.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
